column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Getting a hair cut can be a stressful activity .
#text=You have to know where you are going to go for this service and how much you want to spend .
#text=Some people have one hair dresser they like and stick with that person over years .
#text=I have n't had such luck , so I sometime have to take a gamble and just make an appointment at a random salon .
#text=If I want a new look , I 'll make sure to be prepared with an example picture of exactly what I want , or if I just want a trim I coach myself into being very firm about not cutting too much .
#text=I try to get to my appointment early , in case they 're ready to see me sooner than they expected .
#text=There is generally small talk back and forth during the process , which can be uncomfortable for socially awkard folks like myself , but I muddle through it somehow .
#text=If I am happy with my service and with how my hair looks , I make sure to leave a generous tip .
